Auction this Saturday
Timeless design, classic style and multiple living and alfresco spaces capture the essence of modern family life in this one-owner home architecturally built to deliver the lifestyle of your dreams. This grand entertainer residence will impress you with its spaciousness, elegance and high attention-to-detail design with exceptional appointments that create a serene family sanctuary in a spectacular resort-style setting. Enjoy the tranquillity of the foothills with the therapeutic effects of a water outlook as you enjoy an enviable lifestyle where you can holiday at home.
The spacious open plan family hub with vaulted ceilings, where a granite stone and blackwood island kitchen are a natural gathering point, a sunken lounge/dinning with double-sided open fire and entertainer's bar. This property is ideal for growing families with ample zones to entertain.
Retreat to the master bedroom with its cosy log fire, walk through robe to the ensuite featuring a Velux skylight window. Executive custom-built home office, three bedrooms and a stunning renovated bathroom with Italian floorboard tiles, bar fridge and TV above the bath for ultimate luxurious relaxation. Additionally, there is a fifth bedroom/rumpus extension with its own bathroom and entrance ideal for Teens/gym/guests.
Step outside to your own resort-like oasis where a grand lifestyle statement is made with a spectacular pool/spa/entertaining area that includes covered mains gas bbq, tv points, bar fridges. The negative edge pool and spa built by Natural Pools are solar gas heated, fully tiled and features a Paramount inbuilt floor cleaning system to keep maintenance carefree and simple. The spa daybed area is protected under the roof line for year-round enjoyment.
A bridge connects the house to a tranquil Balinese hut which features a gas heater and full café blinds. Blending seamlessly with its natural environment, the modern innovative design includes a cascading water feature, elegant mood lighting and a state of the art Aqualink electronic control system that effortlessly controls the pool and spa features from inside the house.
Also includes double remote garage, ducted heating, split-systems, freshly painted interiors and new carpet. Situated in a tranquil close with Eastwood Golf Club and scenic walking trails a few steps away, this very special home is also adjacent to parkland meaning added privacy and lawn space adds further appeal.
